channel.title: Don & Zhenhong's Data Lab
channel.description: Let me tell you a story...

item.title: Send me your location, I mean Starbucks and Dunkin' - Part 1
item.description:
"How many coffee shops in Boston?"
Hmmm...well, suppose there are 1 million people in Boston. Then... NOPE. Stop it. This series is nothing about strategy for any brain teaser. This is an analysis about two major coffeehouse chains, Starbucks vs Dunkin' Donuts, "corporate + license" vs pure franchise, in Boston â€¦
item.dc:creator: Don(Zhenhong) Yang
